channel.title: TOML on Digital Forays
channel.description: Recent content in TOML on Digital Forays

item.title: Fetching Data from a TOML File into a HUGO Table
item.description: Continuing to learn the whole HUGO ecosystem here, I figured I would try a little testing of some things. What if I had a bunch of data in a simple .json or .toml or .yaml or whatever file and wanted to pull/fetch data from that file into one of my posts? I did have some data from the last post about Henry James’s use of certain words that we used to generate some of the graphs.
